Latest - Last 48 Hours 21 articles

AI Summary

Generated at 10:29 today

New Features: quick answers availability to all Suite and Knowledge customers, the move of Zendesk QA user and license management to Zendesk Admin Center, import enhancements for the Exchange and Gmail connectors, plus 4 more. Early Access: Zendesk QA for Advanced AI agents.

Share: Email LinkedIn Copy
Automated ticket redaction via triggers in Zendesk Internal Note

Zendesk’s new trigger-based redaction automates the removal of personal data, solving the privacy risks of manual oversight. Combined with Redaction Suggestions from the ADPP add-on, this update enables safer workflows, fewer manual steps, and smarter data hygiene for customer support teams.
